clean_caster_with_towel.description: Wipe the caster using a clean dry towel to remove dust or dirt.

push_caster_in.description: Push the caster into the chair deeper if it is coming loose.

pull_caster_out.description: Extract the caster slightly from the chair for adjustment.

turn_caster.description: Rotate the caster to ensure it moves in all directions without restrictions.

apply_pressure_on_caster.description: Press on the caster to check if it can handle weight.

rotate_caster.description: Rotate the caster to ensure it's working properly.

clean_caster.description: Wipe down the caster to remove any dust or dirt.

press_caster.description: Apply pressure on the caster of the chair.

slide_in_caster.description: Push the caster further into the chair.

slide_out_caster.description: Pull the caster out of the chair a bit more.

check_caster.description: Check the caster for any signs of damage or improper functioning.

clean_wheel_with_cloth.description: Clean the wheel with a cloth to remove any accumulated dust or dirt.

rotate_wheel.description: Rotate the wheel to ensure it is functioning correctly.

clean_wheel.description: Wipe down the wheel to remove any dust or dirt.

press_wheel.description: Apply pressure on the wheel of the chair.

slide_in_wheel.description: Push the wheel further into the chair.

slide_out_wheel.description: Pull the wheel out of the chair a bit more.

check_wheel.description: Check the wheel for any signs of damage or improper functioning.

push_seat_in.description: Push the seat in to adjust for comfort.

pull_seat_out.description: Pull the seat out a bit for comfort adjustment.

spin_seat.description: Rotate the seat to ensure it's moving freely in 360 degrees.

rotate_seat.description: Rotate the seat to adjust its comfort and position.

clean_seat.description: Wipe down the seat to ensure it's clean for use.

press_seat.description: Apply pressure on the seat of the chair.

slide_in_seat.description: Push the seat further into the chair.

slide_out_seat.description: Pull the seat out of the chair a bit more.

check_seat.description: Check the seat for any signs of wear or damage.

clean_chair_leg.description: Wipe the chair leg to keep it clean and hygienic.

clean_leg.description: Wipe down the chair leg to remove any dust or dirt.

clean_chair_leg2.description: Clean the chair leg thoroughly, reaching every nook and cranny.

clean_whole_chair2.description: Perform a deep clean of the entire chair, including the caster, wheel, seat, and chair leg.

no_action_chair_leg.description: Since the chair leg is a static joint, this action implies that no action is performed on it.

clean_chair_leg.description: Clean the chair leg from dust and dirt.

clean_whole_chair.description: Clean the whole chair including caster, wheel, seat, and chair leg.

clean_entire_chair.description: Wipe down the entire chair to keep it clean including the caster, wheel, seat, and chair leg.

clean_whole_chair.description: Clean the entire chair, including the caster, wheel, seat, and leg.

rotate_whole_chair.description: Rotate all the movable parts of the chair to ensure their functioning and placement.

check_whole_chair.description: Perform a general check of the entire chair.
